name: The sun is a deadly lazer
name_original: The sun is a deadly lazer
description:
You're a pre-historic amphibian-lizard thingy that's trying to live on the surface of earth, but the ozone layer hasn't formed yet so the sun is trying to shoot you down with its deadly lasers! 

Imagine the Chrome dinosaur game, except you're being chased by a guardian from Breath of the Wild.

You can pick from three speeds: Normal, half and double.


CONTROLS:

Arrow keys - Move left and right
Space bar - Jump/Confirm
